detail_desc: Shorts in woven fabric with a fake fly, side pockets, a coin pocket, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a welt seam around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the waist.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a shaped neckline, long sleeves and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length dress in softly draping chiffon with a V-neck and a vertical, gathered seam for a draped effect. Long, voluminous puff sleeves and wide cuffs with decorative buttons. Concealed zip in one side, an asymmetric seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Blouse in a softly draping, patterned weave with frills, a V-neck and covered buttons down the front. Seam with a gently flared peplum and long sleeves with smocking and frills at the cuffs.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Classic T-shirt in jersey made from mercerised cotton with a print motif.
Short jacket in stretch cotton twill with contrasting colour seams, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, and an opening with a button at the cuffs.
Metal chain necklace with metal and shell pendants. Adjustable length 39-47.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long sleeves, decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Mesh sections at the back of the knees, and a print motif and reflective details on one leg.
Espadrilles with a jute trim around the soles. Cotton twill and leather linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.

Shirt jacket in imitation leather with a wide collar, press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, cuffs with press-studs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Lined.
Calf-length culottes woven in a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, adjustable belt and pleats at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a deep V-neck at the back with a horizontal smocked strap and an elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
3/4-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, concealed pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with frayed hems.
Soft, non-wired bras in microfibre with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing some wool with small, rib-knit flounces over the shoulders and stocking-stitched sleeves.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Jacket in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lightly padded front and shaped cups with ventilating mesh pockets for breast forms. Adjustable shoulder straps, padded for comfort and a wide fastening at the back with seven different positions for best fit.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a zip down the front with a chin guard, a decorative drawstring at the waist and flap side pockets with a press-stud. Concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined in pile.
3/4-length leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
V-neck maxi dress in softly draping satin with short, flounced sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a wide wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Lined at the top.
Short T-shirt dress in soft jersey with short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print motif on the front, a round neckline and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a deep V-neck, seam centre front, gathers at the shoulders and short cap sleeves.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Wide blouse in a lightly crêped weave with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, padded hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, ribbed cuffs and narrow elastication at the hem. Lined.
Short blouse in a crinkled, textured weave with short puff sleeves and buttons and inset lace trims down the front. Smocking with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Oversized jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Boxy-style jumper in fine-knit wool with a V-neck front and back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, decorative stitching at the back and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Tunic in an airy weave with a slight sheen. Wrapover at the top with a deep V-neck and ties at the waist. Gathers at the shoulders, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Long-sleeved boiler suit in washed cotton denim with a collar, zip down the front and elasticated seam at the waist. Open chest pockets and back pockets, patch front pockets and a concealed press-stud at the cuffs.
Metal hoop earrings decorated with plastic beads in various sizes and colours. Diameter approx. 5 cm.
5-pocket shorts in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
Hi-tops in imitation suede with an imitation leather heel cap and a zip at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Sole 3.5 cm.
Suit waistcoat in a wool weave with a back section in lining fabric. Buttons down the front, two front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif, double-layered, wrapover hood and short slits at the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
Trousers in a patterned weave made from a viscose blend with a detachable tie belt. Side pockets, open back pockets and tapered legs with elastication and a tie at the hems.
T-shirt bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), short, flounced sleeves, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and an asymmetric skirt with a frill down the front. Unlined.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.

Blouse in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and long puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top and have a covered button at the cuffs. Gathered elastication at the front and down the sides and a smocked section at the back. Unlined.
Thin coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in jersey crêpe with pleats at the front of the neckline, an opening with a button at the top and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.

Set with a wrapover bodysuit and trousers in ribbed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at one side and at the crotch, and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, and foldover ribbing at the hems.

Three-piece tracksuit set with a jacket, pair of trousers and T-shirt in fast-drying functional fabric. Jacket with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and short raglan sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets and a fake back pocket. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Fully lined bikini top with decorative gathers at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways. Metal fastener at the back.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Shorts in woven fabric. Relaxed fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and a welt back pocket.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs.
Ankle boots with pointed toes and elastic gores in the sides. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 5 cm.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a print motif on the front. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, a kangaroo pocket and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini top with wide shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in soft cotton flannel. Shirt with a rounded collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and wide, straight legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
